title: Add a "I represent a company" option to the user form. Fixes #76
body_html:
I've done this in a very basic way, added some fields to the user and the form.

The label on the check box doesn't render quite as I expected (see image)

Not an expert on simple_form, now I'm doing

= f.input :is_company, as: :boolean, label: "I represent a company"

This is even worse:

= f.input :is_company, as: :boolean, inline_label: "I represent a company"

Any suggestions?
